Title: Requires instruction on conflict resolution for elementary, middle, and high school students
Summary: Requires age-appropriate instruction on conflict resolution for elementary, middle, and high school students; requires the commissioner to develop curricula for schools in the state for such instruction; directs the commissioner to develop resource materials to facilitate such instruction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring instruction on conflict resolution for elementary, middle, and high school students
